intro: Go deep or go home with nothing.
description:
You start with a shovel and a dream. Beneath your feet? A world of treasure, tech, and ancient oddities just waiting to be uncovered.

Crack open the earth, sell your finds, and upgrade your gear. The deeper you go, the weirder it gets—old coins, lost gadgets, forgotten ruins... and some things that maybe should’ve stayed buried.

No timers. No stress. Just you, your tools, and the thrill of discovery. Dig smart, dig bold—and if something starts glowing? Uh... maybe back away slowly.
